title: Science Foundation Competency MOOC for Adult Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Awareness of the necessity for foundational understanding in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Practical learning design considering real-world task integration for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core scientific concepts with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners apply scientific approaches to solve real-world workplace problems.
Learners improve their learning content by ≥90% based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
